trans-unit.source: Represents the tip of a stylus.
trans-unit.target: Representa a ponta de uma caneta.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StylusShape> specifies the shape, width, and height of the tip of a stylus.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StylusShape> Especifica a forma, a largura e a altura de dica de uma caneta.

trans-unit.source: Methods such as <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection.Erase%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection.HitTest%2A> use a <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StylusShape> to determine the stylus tip of the hitting stroke.
trans-unit.target: Métodos como <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection.Erase%2A> e <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection.HitTest%2A> usar um <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StylusShape> para determinar a dica de caneta do traço hitting.

trans-unit.source: This class is not typically used in XAML.
trans-unit.target: Essa classe não é usada normalmente em XAML.

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to create a <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StylusShape> and pass it to the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection.GetIncrementalStrokeHitTester%2A> method to erase a portion of a <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir demonstra como criar um <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StylusShape> e passá-lo para o <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection.GetIncrementalStrokeHitTester%2A> método para apagar parte de um <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>.

trans-unit.source: This example assumes that there is a <xref:System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalStrokeHitTester> called `eraseTester` and that its <xref:System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalStrokeHitTester.StrokeHit> event has been connected to the event handler defined in this example.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo supõe que haja uma <xref:System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalStrokeHitTester> chamado `eraseTester` e que seu <xref:System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalStrokeHitTester.StrokeHit> evento foi conectado ao manipulador de eventos definido neste exemplo.

trans-unit.source: To create a control that allows a user to erase ink, see [How to: Erase Ink on a Custom Control](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/how-to-erase-ink-on-a-custom-control.md).
trans-unit.target: Para criar um controle que permite que um usuário apagar tinta, consulte [como: apagar tinta em um controle personalizado](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/how-to-erase-ink-on-a-custom-control.md).

trans-unit.source: Gets the height of the stylus.
Gets the angle of the stylus.
Gets the width of the stylus.
